intro: Villadia reniformis, commonly known as the kidney leaf plant, is a species of flowering plant in the family Acanthaceae. It is native to tropical regions of Africa and is characterized by its distinctive kidney-shaped leaves. The plant produces small, clustered flowers that are typically pink or red in color. It thrives in moist, well-drained soil and prefers partial to full sunlight. Villadia reniformis is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its attractive foliage and compact growth habit.
